Uses of Package
org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events

  • Packages that use org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.webcomp.markdowndisplay
    A portlet component for displaying markdown text in a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcomp.sysinfo
    A portlet component for displaying system information in a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.base
    Provides the components for building a portal based on the core, io and http packages.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events
    The events used by the portal related components.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.base.freemarker
    Classes for implementing a freemarker based portlet.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.jqueryui
    Provides a portal weblet that implements the portal page using the JQuery UI framework.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.chartjs
    Provides a component for adding the Chart.js library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.datatables
    Provides a component for adding the datatables library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.fontawesome
    Provides a component for adding the Fontawesome free web font to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.gridstack
    Provides a component for adding the Gridstack.js library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.jgpvuecomponents
    Provides some vue components used in but independent of the Vue.js portal which may also be of interest when implementing portlets.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.jquery
    Provides a component for adding the jquery library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.jqueryui
    Provides a component for adding the jQueryUI library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.jquitouchpunch
    Provides a component for adding the jQuery UI Touch Punch library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.lodash
    Provides a component for adding the Lodash library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.markdownit
    Provides a component for adding the markdownit library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.moment
    Provides a component for adding the moment library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.vue
    Provides a component for adding the Vue.js library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.vuejs
    Provides a component for adding the vue.js library to a portal.
    org.jgrapes.webcon.provider.vuex
    Provides a component for adding the Vuex library to a portal.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events used by org.jgrapes.webcomp.markdowndisplay 
    Class and Description
    AddPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if a new portlet instance of a given type should be added to the portal page.
    DeletePortletRequest
    A request to delete a portlet instance.
    NotifyPortletModel
    A decoded notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) that invokes a method on a portlet model.
    PortalReady
    Signals the successful loading of the portal structure in the browser.
    RenderPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if an existing portlet instance should be updated.
    UpdatePortletModel
    Sent to a portlet to update some of its properties.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events used by org.jgrapes.webcomp.sysinfo 
    Class and Description
    AddPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if a new portlet instance of a given type should be added to the portal page.
    DeletePortletRequest
    A request to delete a portlet instance.
    NotifyPortletModel
    A decoded notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) that invokes a method on a portlet model.
    PortalReady
    Signals the successful loading of the portal structure in the browser.
    RenderPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if an existing portlet instance should be updated.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events used by org.jgrapes.webcon.base 
    Class and Description
    AddPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if a new portlet instance of a given type should be added to the portal page.
    DeletePortletRequest
    A request to delete a portlet instance.
    JsonInput
    A JSON notification from the portal view (browser) to the portal.
    NotifyPortletModel
    A decoded notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) that invokes a method on a portlet model.
    PageResourceRequest
    An event that signals the request of a resource that is to be added to the <head> section of the page.
    PortalCommand
    Events derived from this class are transformed to JSON messages that are sent to the portal session.
    PortalConfigured
    This event is the completed event for the PortalPrepared event.
    PortalLayoutChanged
    Notifies the server about a change of the portal layout.
    PortalPrepared
    This event is the completion event for the PortalReady event.
    PortalReady
    Signals the successful loading of the portal structure in the browser.
    PortletResourceRequest
    An event that signals the request of a resource by the portal (browser).
    RenderPortlet
    A base class for portal rendering.
    RenderPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if an existing portlet instance should be updated.
    RenderPortletRequestBase
    The base class for events that result in a portlet being rendered.
    ResourceRequest
    An event that signals the request for a resource by the browser.
    ResourceRequestCompleted
    Indicates that a ResourceRequest event has been completed.
    SetLocale
    Signals that the locale for the portal has changed.
    SetLocaleCompleted
    Indicates that the processing of a SetLocale event has been completed.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events used by org.jgrapes.webcon.base.events 
    Class and Description
    AddPageResources
    Adds <link .../>, <style>...</style> or <script ...></script> nodes to the portal’s <head> node on behalf of components that provide such resources.
    AddPageResources.ScriptResource
    Represents a script resource that is to be loaded or evaluated by the browser.
    AddPortletRequest
    Sent to the portal (server) if a new portlet instance of a given type should be added to the portal page.
    AddPortletType
    Adds a portlet type with its global resources (JavaScript and/or CSS) to the portal page.
    DisplayNotification
    Causes a notification to be display on the top of the portal page.
    PortalCommand
    Events derived from this class are transformed to JSON messages that are sent to the portal session.
    PortalPrepared
    This event is the completion event for the PortalReady event.
    PortalReady
    Signals the successful loading of the portal structure in the browser.
    RenderPortlet
    A base class for portal rendering.
    RenderPortletRequestBase
    The base class for events that result in a portlet being rendered.
    ResourceRequest
    An event that signals the request for a resource by the browser.
    SetLocale
    Signals that the locale for the portal has changed.
    UpdatePortletModel
    Sent to a portlet to update some of its properties.
